CustomField.formula: IF (FS_no_of_Reschedules__c>3, TEXT(FS_no_of_Reschedules__c)+'th Reschedule', IF(FS_no_of_Reschedules__c=3,'3rd Reschedule', IF(FS_no_of_Reschedules__c=2,'2nd Reschedule', IF(FS_no_of_Reschedules__c=1,'1st Reschedule','No Reschedules' ))))
CustomField.label: Install Date Reschedule Instance
